According to the US Passport records on Ancestry.com, his wife is listed as "Elvira G.", born either on September 4, 1878  or 1880 in Capua, Italy  )there are three records, two with 9/4/1880, one with 9/4/1878).

She apparently had been in Italy for health reasons for some time as of the latest passport application (1921, living in Italy since December 1913 at that point), but was listing her permanent address as Los Angeles, California.

A family tree listed on Ancestry has her maiden name as 'Savelli' along with two children, Lewis (b 1902) and Florence (b 1904).
